name: Floppy from Outer Space
description:
Floppy From Outer Space

Floppy From Outer Space is a puzzle game where you play as a computer virus on Mars that needs to find a way to a rocket to reach Earth. Go to the rocket, and unleash chaos on your way!

Floppy From Outer Space has two gameplays: 

  • Electricity, where you act and move in electric cables
  • Possession, where you can possess and control a chosen character 

The levels can be completed in multiple, different ways, and it's up to you to choose which path you will take!

Synopsis

In the near future, an egocentric multi-billionaire decides to build a colony on Mars. To do this, he sends autonomous robots to set up a base.

After a few weeks on the red planet, they find several boxes containing a total of 6,543 floppy disks. They decide to insert them one by one in a computer to see what's on them: a computer virus wakes up! 

You play this virus! Your goal? Find a way to Earth to destroy humanity!
